relevant_findings.head_and_neck: AT, NC, soft, supple, no masses
relevant_findings.abdomen: soft, ND, tender in lower abdomen (R > L), no rebound, mild tenderness to percussion

relevant_findings.HEENT: NCAT, PERRL, EOMI, no pharyngeal erythema, no scleral icterus, no nasal d/c, no LAD
relevant_findings.pulmonary: + mild crackles at the L lung base
relevant_findings.abdomen: + ostomy bag in place, no surrounding erythema, +bs, soft, NTND, no HSM
relevant_findings.upper_extremities: erythema around L arm line but no warmth or tenderness, + non-pitting edema in upper arm and elbow
relevant_findings.lower_extremities: + non-pitting edema in ___ up to thigh
